newsitem.title: USA: DCX terminates Airtech share swap deal.
newsitem.headline: DCX terminates Airtech share swap deal.

text.p: DCX Inc Monday said it has terminated its share exchange agreement with Airtech International Corp of Dallas, Texas, due to a breach of certain agreement provisions by Airtech.
DCX says Airtech alleges DCX is in breach of the agreement. DCX said it believes the Airtech allegations are without merit.
In July, DCX, an aerospace and defense subcontractor, said it would buy Airtech, offering two shares of DCX stock for 3.5 shares of Airtech.
Airtech is a manufacturer and distrubutor of clinical-grade air-purification systems.
